Package com.intellij.openapi.editor.markup

Class TextAttributes

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.openapi.editor.markup.TextAttributes
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ColorAndFontDescription

    public class TextAttributes
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Defines the visual representation (colors and effects) of text.

      • merge

        public static TextAttributes merge(TextAttributes under,
                                   TextAttributes above)
        Merges (layers) the two given text attributes.
        Parameters:
        under - Text attributes to merge "under".
        above - Text attributes to merge "above", overriding settings from "under".
        Returns:
        Merged attributes instance.

        public void withAdditionalEffects(java.util.Map<EffectType,java.awt.Color> effectsMap)

        See Also:
        setAdditionalEffects(Map), TextAttributesEffectsBuilder
